DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate systemic pharmacokinetics CHF6001 follow concomitant administration CHF6001 CHF5259 , comparison single component , administer healthy subject via multi-dose reservoir NEXThaler® DPI .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Interaction Safety Inhaled CHF5259 CHF6001
DOC.detailed_description: This randomise open label , 3-way cross-over study . Each 14-day treatment period separate follow one 21-day wash-out period . Subjects reside clinic facility 14 day treatment period .
